name: Five Nights at Freddy's X
description:
Hello, and welcome to your new job at Freddy Fazbear's Pizza! You will be working the night shift from 12am to 6am. It should all go fine, Phone Person will give you the ropes. The AI was just updated, and so it should be extra safe!

Death or Dismemberment is not covered by Fazbear Entertainment, take the job at your own risk.

Version Alpha 1.5.3

Play plays night 1, Continue plays night 2, on Version Alpha 1.2.3 and later, 3 plays night 3. 4 plays, you guessed it, night 4. 

M to go to Main Menu

Suggestions and feedback welcome.
